SEARCH
Package analysis.Math

Class ElevationProfile

java.lang.Object
analysis.Math.ElevationProfile
public class ElevationProfile extends Object
Represents an elevation profile with data points and provides various operations on it.

    Description

    • profile

      private ArrayList<DataPoint> profile

  • Constructor Details

    • ElevationProfile

      public ElevationProfile(ArrayList<DataPoint> profile)
      Constructs an elevation profile with the specified data points.
      Parameters:
      profile - The elevation profile data points.

  • Method Details

    • smooth

      public void smooth(int windowSize, double steepness)
      Smoothes the elevation profile using a moving window averaging approach. The window size determines the number of data points used for the averaging.
      Parameters:
      windowSize - The size of the moving window.
      steepness - The steepness parameter used in the smoothing algorithm.

    • removeUnnecessaryDataPoints

      public void removeUnnecessaryDataPoints()
      Removes unnecessary data points from the elevation profile. This includes removing duplicate points, consecutive points with the same elevation, and averaging the y-values of points with the same x-value.

    • spacePointsEvenly

      public void spacePointsEvenly(double spacing)
      Spaces the data points evenly along the x-axis with the specified spacing.
      Parameters:
      spacing - The desired spacing between data points.

    • calculateSlopeData

      public SlopeData calculateSlopeData()
      Calculates slope data for the elevation profile.
      Returns:
      The calculated slope data.

    • getTrackLength

      public double getTrackLength()
      Gets the length of the track represented by the elevation profile.
      Returns:
      The track length.

    • getDataSetSize

      public int getDataSetSize()
      Gets the size of the data set in the elevation profile.
      Returns:
      The size of the data set.

    • toCSV

      public String toCSV()
      Converts the elevation profile to a CSV string.
      Returns:
      The CSV representation of the elevation profile.
